name: Improve-my-recipe
body:
# Hey improve my recipes!


## Why?

Well, I'm not a technical chef. 

I just enjoy trying new stuff in my kitchen and want to share what im doing daily so you can try what i did and of course improve my recipes ;)

## How?

Fork this project and if you have a better version of my recipe just make the pull request ;)
tagline: My cooking recipes. Fork and improve them with a pull request!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
